prompts: Create a cute Pokemon that has fluffy ears and a gentle expression.
I want a pink and white Pokemon with soft features and a caring personality.
Generate a Normal-type Pokemon that looks like a small mammal with long ears.
Make an adorable fairy-like creature that is friendly and loves to help others.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a small rabbit, with pastel colors and a sweet demeanor.
Design a Pokemon known for its healing abilities, featuring soft fur and a cheerful vibe.
Show me a fluffy Pokemon that enjoys living in peaceful forest environments.
